name: run_command
description: Execute a shell command on the user's computer. Use this to run scripts, install packages, or perform system administration tasks. BE CAREFUL with destructive commands.

name: read_file
description: Read the contents of a file from the local file system.

path.description: The absolute path to the file.

name: write_file
description: Write content to a file. Can be used to create new files or overwrite existing ones.

path.description: The absolute path to the file.

append.description: If true, append the content to the existing file instead of overwriting it.

name: move_file
description: Move or rename a file from a source path to a destination path.

source.description: The current absolute path of the file.

destination.description: The new absolute path for the file.

name: copy_file
description: Copy a file from a source path to a destination path.

source.description: The absolute path of the source file.

destination.description: The new absolute path for the destination file.

name: delete_file
description: Delete a file from the local file system. USE WITH EXTREME CAUTION.

path.description: The absolute path of the file to delete.

name: make_directory
description: Create a new directory at the specified path.

path.description: The absolute path of the directory to create.

name: list_directory
description: List the files and subdirectories within a given directory.

path.description: The absolute path to the directory.

name: get_system_info
description: Retrieve information about the system (OS, memory, CPU, etc.).

name: open_app
description: Launch a desktop application by name.

app_name.description: The name of the application to open.

name: close_app
description: Close a running application by name.

app_name.description: The name of the application to close.

name: get_clipboard_content
description: Read the current content of the system clipboard.

name: set_clipboard_content
description: Set the content of the system clipboard.

content.description: The text to copy to the clipboard.

name: send_notification
description: Display a desktop notification.

name: create_skill
description: Create a new skill for the agent. This saves a markdown file in the skills directory that defines how the agent should handle a specific task in the future. Skill files should include triggers and specific command steps.

name.description: The name of the skill (e.g., 'Search Google', 'Analyze Logs').

description.description: A brief description of what the skill does.

instructions.description: The specific markdown content of the skill, including steps and examples.

filename.description: The filename to save as (e.g., 'search_google.md'). Must end in .md.

name: get_skill_details
description: Fetch the full instructions and implementation details for a specific skill. Use this when you need to perform a task that matches a skill's description but you don't have the full instructions in your current context.

skill_name.description: The name of the skill folder (e.g., 'web_search', 'email').

name: update_config
description: Update the agent's configuration or save a secret (like an API key). Secrets will be encrypted. The updated value is available immediately in the environment.

isSecret.description: Whether to encrypt the value before saving.

name: create_reminder
description: Create a new reminder or scheduled task. Supports one-time reminders (using `dueAt`) or recurring reminders (using `repeat`). Can auto-execute tasks.

message.description: The content of the reminder. If autoExecute is true, this is the label.

dueAt.description: ISO 8601 date string for when the reminder is due (e.g. '2023-10-27T10:00:00Z'). use `get_current_time` to calculate relative times.

repeat.description: Cron expression or simple string (e.g. 'every 5 minutes') for recurring reminders.

autoExecute.description: If true, the agent will attempt to perform the action described in 'taskPrompt' automatically when due.

taskPrompt.description: The specific instruction for the agent to execute if autoExecute is true.

name: list_reminders
description: List all active reminders.

name: delete_reminder
description: Delete a reminder by ID.

id.description: The ID of the reminder to delete.

name: update_reminder
description: Update an existing reminder.

id.description: The ID of the reminder to update.
